Posts.Content: kellyseye wrote:  i have literally just found a lump in my left breast and am absolutely petrified. it seems to have appeared overnight its about a cm in size and quite firm which is scaring me. I've had lumps before after shaving but not as big and I've just finished a menstrual cycle, need some comforting words to get me through the weekend til i see my g.p. Am very very scared Log in to post a reply
